function ERU_EP04_18()
    -- .転-2【12月第3週】【回想】「向き合うべきもの」
    SaveData.Title = "向き合うべきもの"

    -- //BG：公園
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I had a dream. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    -- //BU：モブ子ども×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ It was the memory of being bullied as a child, a dream I've had countless times. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("kid1_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
【Children】
"Hey-hey! Weakling Minato!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("kid1_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
【Children】
"Always protected by your big sister, you spoiled brat!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BUF_CMI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1357.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】Shota · Sadness
"S-stay away... I’m not a spoiled brat." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Big sister Marika was already busy even back then. She couldn’t always come to my rescue. ]])

    MSG([[ But I had another person who protected me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0160.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
"Minachan, why are you crying? Those kids bullied you, didn’t they?" ]])
    -- //幼いアルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0161.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
"You want to become stronger, don’t you?" ]])
    -- //幼いアルメリア

    MSG([[ That’s right, I remember now. Besides big sister Marika, I had another older sister. ]])

    MSG([[ She didn’t have superhuman strength like Marika, but she understood me better than anyone. She was always watching over me from afar. ]])

    MSG([[ And strangely, her voice resembled that of Arumeria-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0162.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
"Hey, Minachan. Maybe we can’t change what we’re born with." ]])
    -- //幼いアルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0163.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
"But even so, I think it’s important to face it head-on without looking away." ]])
    -- //幼いアルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0164.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
"Because I was able to meet you, Minachan." ]])
    -- //幼いアルメリア

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0165.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
"So I promise, no matter what happens, I will absolutely protect you, Minachan." ]])
    -- //幼いアルメリア

    MSG([[ —No. I almost said it out loud but stopped. ]])

    MSG([[ Why do neither big sister Marika nor ●●●-neechan cherish me? Why do they prioritize me over themselves? ]])

    MSG([[ If I could be forgiven, I’d go back to this time right now and become stronger. ]])

    MSG([[ Big sister. No, I want to become strong enough to put my sisters at ease. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m done with being the one who is protected. Absolutely done. This time, I’ll be the one protecting my two big sisters. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter what I lose, no matter how much time passes, this feeling won’t change. ]])

    MSG([[ I will keep reaching out until I catch up to my sisters. No matter how many times I stumble. No matter how many times I get discouraged. No matter how many tears I shed— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0022.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
"I promised I would definitely catch up."]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_19")
end
